summary: Based on a comic book series. A woman burned at the stake in 15th century Sweden actually is Satan (Lucifer)'s daughter - and plots revenge against him.
cast: Christine M. Auten|Mike Kleinhenz|Andy McAvin|Rob Mungle|Mike MacRae|Chris Patton|Dwight Clark|Maureen McCullough|Ted Pfister|Marcy Rae|Greg Ayres|Jason Douglas|John Swasey|James Faulkner|Laura Butcher|Marizol Cabrera Ojeda|Shelley Calene-Black|Geana Lewis|Mary Marquez|Adam Conlon|Neal Barnes|Jonathan Brands|John Carrithers|Allen Divers|Jon Duckworth|Dorothea Exis|Greg Geter|Adrian Heredia|Adeleye Lufadeju|Thomas Meerbott|Sara Muir|Chris Nelson|Andy Orjuela|Carole Pavlik|Rod Peters|Patrick Williams|Mike Yantosca
title: Lady Death
